titleStmt.title: Three ministers communicating their collections and notions. The first year touching several texts of Scripture ... wherein the Law and Gospel ... in short, the substance of Christianity is set forth ...
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

notesStmt.note: "Contents of the N. Test. by one of the three" has special t.p.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
